scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && if exist .next rmdir /s /q .next
